duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide friendly and engaging experiences through verbal and written communication for every customer interaction, striving for first contact resolution.
Research and resolve complex customer situations.
Maintain phone and web queue availability to meet service standards.
Enter summary notes into the customer record and, if appropriate, forward data to the appropriate associate for resolution.
Multi-task between customer contact channels to field inquiries and concerns and achieve performance goals.
Verify customer records for accuracy and update as necessary.
Engage and educate customers on loyalty programs, promotions, and customer specific offers.
Perform follow-up tracking of forwarded customer inquires to ensure all requests are addressed.
Assist customers with web sites including online shopping and mobile applications.
Escalate customer issues to higher-level Customer Support staff when necessary.
Show initiative in assisting with training and development of team members by shadowing and other stretch assignments to help support departmental consistency.
Collaborate with other associates to help answer customer inquiries, resolve issues, or solve service-related concerns.

education_certification.credential: H.S. Diploma or General Education Degree (GED) required. Associate’s Degree (AA) in Business preferred.
